table.name: vtiger_bhscampaignlist
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaignlist` ( `bhscampaignlistid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscampaignlist_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignlistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscampaignlistcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaignlistcf` ( `bhscampaignlistid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignlistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
